WorkItem.Description:
I thought I'd post a few feedback issues with the latest Mage checkin. 
- Arcane and Frost are taking the 4-piece T13, 
- Fire is not taking the 4-piece T13.
- No support for the proc from the trinket Will of Unbinding (Intellect Stacking proc from Damaging Spell Cast)
- Could not tell if program was using PTR mode or not, the option is not showing.
- The nerf to Dragonwrath's proc (~5% now from the 10% on live) does not seem to be present.

Comments.Message: From what Maje has reported (link: http://elitistjerks.com/f75/t110187-cataclysm_mage_simulators_formulators/p16/#post2039255) and also from what I see from my own tests on the PTR, it looks like the new DTR proc is ~1/12 or ~8.3%, at least for fire.

I believe the gnome racial Arcane Resistance is not being properly captured by the mage model for Rawr.  This should apply a passive arcane resistance of +1 per character level.  This was noticed using 4.2.6.0 online on 11/11/2011.
